name: hotswap-module
description: Replace a Node.js module with another module without any code changes

scripts.test: standard && node test/no-hotswap.js && node test/hotswap.js && node -r ./index.js test/no-hotswap.js && HOTSWAP=http,https node -r ./index.js test/cli.js

author: Thomas Watson <w@tson.dk> (https://twitter.com/wa7son)
